description: The Claimant Count - the stock of Universal Credit and Job Seekers Allowance claimants broken down by sex, age and type of benefit being claimed.

indicator: Percentage of dependent children (0-18) in out-of-work households
source: Department for Work and Pensions,Percentage of children living in households where a parent or guardian claimed out-of-work benefits in May each year.

description: Managers, directors and senior officials OR Professional occupations compared with all usual residents aged 16 to 74 in employment.

indicator: Households with no adults in employment with dependent children
description: Percentage of households with no adults in employment and with dependent children aged 15 or under.
